name: Flourishing Finish
summary: Your martial prowess demoralizes all who can see you.
description:
Attempt a Performance check, comparing the result to the Will DC of each foe within 30 feet who can see you. Regardless of the result, each target is immune to your Flourishing Finish for 10 minutes.

Critical Success The target is frightened 2.
Success The target is frightened 1.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.

Concentrate: An action with this trait requires a degree of mental concentration and discipline.Emotion: This effect alters a creature's emotions. Effects with this trait always have the mental trait as well. Creatures with special training or that have mechanical or artificial intelligence are immune to emotion effects.Mental: A mental effect can alter the target's mind. It has no effect on an object or a mindless creature.
